coreAttributes.name: crotchless jeans
coreAttributes.description: A unisex pair of jeans, which have been designed with no crotch area. The buttocks are still covered, though.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the jeans, before pulling them up and fastening the button above [npc.her] groin.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the jeans, before pulling them up and fastening the button above [npc2.her] groin.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the jeans, before yanking them up and fastening the button above [npc2.her] groin.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the button on [npc.her] jeans, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the button on [npc2.namePos] jeans, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the button on [npc2.namePos] jeans, before yanking them off.
